mapper.select: SELECT HOUB.COMPANY_ID FROM HR_EMPLOYEE_ASSIGN HEA INNER JOIN HR_ORG_POSITION_B HOPB ON ( HEA.POSITION_ID = HOPB.POSITION_ID AND HEA.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId} AND HEA.PRIMARY_POSITION_FLAG = 'Y') INNER JOIN HR_ORG_UNIT_B HOUB ON HOUB.UNIT_ID = HOPB.UNIT_ID

SELECT PU.UNIT_ID , PU.POSITION_NAME , PU.UNIT_NAME , A.* FROM HR_EMPLOYEE_ASSIGN A , ( SELECT P.POSITION_ID , PT. NAME POSITION_NAME , U.UNIT_ID , UT. NAME UNIT_NAME FROM HR_ORG_POSITION_B P LEFT OUTER JOIN HR_ORG_POSITION_TL PT ON( P.POSITION_ID = PT.POSITION_ID AND PT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) , HR_ORG_UNIT_B U LEFT OUTER JOIN HR_ORG_UNIT_TL UT ON( U.UNIT_ID = UT.UNIT_ID AND UT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE P.UNIT_ID = U.UNIT_ID ) PU WHERE A.POSITION_ID = PU.POSITION_ID AND A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
